message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your belief in its value. However, I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Bob, I understand your desire to stay within budget.  While I value your interest,  $12,000 is significantly below my bottom line. Could you meet me at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $12,500 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
